website_summaries.verdict: A solid, modern-looking piece at a very decent price, although the assembly can be a little irritating.
pros: Your choice of natural or gray finish
Constructed of a laminate wood with powder-coated steel base
Assembles in an hour or less
Mid-century modern furniture look at a low price
cons: Both the minimal directions and the fact that it can arrive missing key parts can make assembly a bit challenging

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable Quality and Price!
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, I decided to keep my expectations relatively low for this piece. So you can imagine my surprise when I found that not only was the quality on this impeccable but it also was incredibly easy to assemble. This piece looks absolutely gorgeous and I am so impressed with how sturdy and stable it is. Still can't believe how amazing it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Pippa

customer_reviews.title: Good look!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this shelf! It looks very sleek and modern. It was quick to assemble but the third shelf didn’t align with the holes on the frame so I had to drill my own. It would’ve been 5 stars if everything had lined up!
customer_reviews.author: Alondra S

customer_reviews.title: shelf for now, not a forever shelf
customer_reviews.text: Cute shelf, but you get what you pay for... I do not plan on putting anything heavy on this shelf. Installation was easy enough, was frustrated when I discovered one of the screws in pack was smooth - had no ridges - and had to replace with a different one, pack only includes the exact amount of screws needed. Was unable to use mounting hardware included because my baseboards keep the shelf from bring flush to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shelf
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shelf, was easy to put together, had everything that was needed. I only ordered one because I wasn't sure if I was going to like it but I do, so just ordered the second one. I also purchased this one because I thought I might be able to take the bottom shelf out, which I was able to. We have 2 sub things in the media room and I am told they can not be removed so I needed to work around this. This shelf was perfect. Maybe this room will start looking like the media room it is. Off to a great start.
customer_reviews.author: K. Allin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a ladder shelf everywhere. I checked target, tj Maxx, & found one at hobby lobby that was over $100. I was a little weary of ordering this one because of the price, but I just went ahead and ordered because I needed one asap. If you are on the fence buy it!!! It is so cute and takes little to no time to assemble. For the price it is definitely worth the money simply because there were shelves like this at hobby lobby and on target’s website that costed well over $100. Awesome purchase& I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kallie

customer_reviews.title: Great shelving unit!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed! Bought this for my husband’s massage room and it was perfect. Matched the room, sturdy, and we plan on purchasing a basket to put on the lowest shelf, which will hold a bigger basket than expected. We are probably going to purchase the same unit for our house now.
customer_reviews.author: RMCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shelf unit for photos & trinkets
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding shelves for the price! Sturdy and extremely easy to assemble. I did it all on my own!!! The grey has brown undertone so in certain light it looks a little on the brown side the top shelf is very narrow. Other than that perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and good looking shelves!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these shelves! We have a giant empty wall that has brand new plaster behind our tv. I hated the idea of hanging things on the wall, so I decided to give these a try to break up the space and I’m very happy with how it turned out. I assembled these alone over the course of two nights. Each one took about an hour. It would be faster with two people. They seem very sturdy and are of a good quality for the price. They are much cheaper than similar shelves I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Literally PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: My bf and I were able to assemble it without instructions in about 30-45 minutes. It’s a bit wobbly until you screw the shelves on, but once they are on it works like a charm. So far the surface is holding up well. I definitely have some weight on it and it doesn’t seem to be compromising the integrity of the structure. I also have a humidifier going it’s not showing any issues with moisture either. I would def recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Alison K

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was overwhelmed at the “instructions” at first but with a little common sense this is pretty easy to put together. Quality seems great, it’s really sturdy. All the pieces fit together perfectly, holes are in the right places, everything was a-ok 👌🏽 I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Zineera

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, assembly sucks, don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This shelf has a factory defect where one of the legs that is towards the front is shorter than the other and you don’t realize it until you’re done building it because it’s hardly noticeable but it will tilt. And if you try to unscrew and fix it the screws strip so you can't really fix it. The instructions are awful, they should make it clear which leg goes in the front and which goes in the back right from the start but they don't... I have 75% of a shelf that will never stand flat without being wobbly. Totally useless, don't buy this
customer_reviews.author: Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by this shelf. It’s very sturdy and a lot bigger than I anticipated. Very spacious for a lot of storage. Our master bathroom has no cabinets or anything so this was perfect. It was super easy to assemble by myself. Took maybe 20 minutes. The bottom board didnt match up all the way and sticks out just a bit but honestly not a big deal for me. I like the shelf and the color.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M Buckle

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Slightly Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple ladder bookshelf with lots of storage. The bottom shelf easily fits a printer if that’s what you’re looking to use it for (pictured: HP OfficeJet Pro 8035). One thing to note is it is a little wobbly on its own (note: I didn’t use the attachments that come with the shelf to secure it to the wall because it rests against a brick-backed wall).
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The perfect ladder shelf
customer_reviews.text: It is just like the picture!! For the price, the quality is pretty good! Directions were pretty good, only had to unscrew one leg and put it on the right way, otherwise really easy to put together and they give you all tools youll need! It is clean, crisp and lovely! The shipping came quicker than expected and was all packed up, no dents or scratches! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Congdon

customer_reviews.title: find something else
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm not giving this 1 star is because it LOOKS so good. Directions are minimal, parts aren't labeled (you basically just have to figure it out yourself). The holes for the shelves are uneven (we had to use a power tool to make a new one) and the "X" thing on the back hooks into four holes (one was missing, we used tape). The only reason I'm not returning is because it would be such a pain to take apart. There are so many others like this design at a similar price point, do yourself a favor and buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I am FURIOUS and DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 0 if I could! I bought this product for my new house in the city that I’m moving into at the end of the month. I purchased it in July and put it in storage until I was getting ready to move. My mom and I just opened it and THE PARTS WERE MISSING! There were zero shelves. My return window closed yesterday. This was the biggest waste of my money. I was so excited for this shelf because I purchased it on my own and it would have matched perfectly in my bedroom. I am extremely angry and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Hollabaugh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to assemble but if you inventory all the parts you are good to go. I did not mount to the wall so there's a lot of screws and stuff you might not use. LOVE THIS PIECE!!!
customer_reviews.author: SaraSmile

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelves, but terrible instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, just like the but holy crap the instructions are garbage. Th lable on the legs are on the bag, and the instructions make it to where you have A LOT of trial and error. The shelf themselves after FINALLY getting the assembled correctly are nice. If they put better instructions on assembly then i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic and Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rave enough about this bookshelf! It’s allowed me to free up so much space in my room. Would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for a great 4 tier shelf. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Elgin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great shelves. At first I was a little leary about the sturdiness, but these are really sturdy and heavier than I thought. Great buy, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: catlvr

customer_reviews.title: Not super easy to build but still worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit confusing to put together. The instructions are not super clear for the first two steps and there are only picture diagrams. However, that being said I never build my own furniture and was able to figure it out in less than 2 hours. Once built I was very pleased. It looks amazing and it is very sturdy. I live in a small studio apartment and use it for my snow globe collection and other trinkets. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. I ordered it expecting it to be a lot different in color and probably not as id as it actually is. I’m very happy with it and would recommend it to anyone. It’s easy to assemble, it took me about 25min to do so :)
customer_reviews.author: Hidaner Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price! Loved so much I got 2!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and they are pretty sturdy shelves! I bought 2 and they were easy to assemble. The instructions were ahh not so easy but it doesn’t take a genius. Great addition to my living area. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my, very small, home office. I needed a shelf to hold some things and look acceptable for guests. This fit perfectly in the space. It doesn’t take up too much room, looks professional, and holds my stuff. The only criticism I have is that some of the holds for the shelves didn’t match up perfectly and as a result some of the screws are in a little crooked. You would never notice unless you were looking for it, and the shelf is still sturdy, but it’s not good to have such an obvious defect.
customer_reviews.author: AErin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Decent book shelf. Does the job and looks nice. Not the best materials used, but you’re also not paying that much.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertainment set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bookshelf because they were the only ones with shelves deep enough and tall enough to fit my home theater speakers. I think the end product looks great and the shelves are great quality, especially for MDF. It's pretty easy to assemble, just pay attention to the pictures and where the wholes are supposed to line up and you'll be fine. I am definitely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but not great
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit together fine, but it took almost an hour to assemble. It could have been designed much more simply. It looks nice, but not like a real piece of furniture from a furniture store. It's a little lightweight for the living room. Would be great to have one or two in an office. Nice sturdy shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kris in PA

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that it is slightly difficult to assemble. Had to take it apart once and put it back together again. Just pay attention to the instructions and you should be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bubel

customer_reviews.title: Love my units
customer_reviews.text: I got this and I’m really impress of the quality every screw went into place perfectly I put them together by my self is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Chao

customer_reviews.title: Bottom board is too large
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was easy to put together until we got to the last shelf. The board for ours is too large and does not line up with the holes at all. The rest of the shelves went on with no problem, but now we have to find something to fill in the large gap that is left on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kuczynski

customer_reviews.title: Very cute bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bookshelf and I don't have anything else to say it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, it’s fairly sturdy. As you can see in the photo I just have knickknacks on it, I’m not sure how it would hold if you were to put heavier items on it. It’s perfect for my loft. I gave it four stars because I don’t know how long it’s going to last but even if it lasts a year I think it was well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute shelf with ample storage
customer_reviews.text: Needed some extra storage in our bathroom that also looked aesthetically pleasing. This ladder shelf gets the job done and also looks nice. Comparatively to other bathroom storage cabinets, this was relatively inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: Jayce35

customer_reviews.title: Love this bookshelf!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and just the right size! Putting it together took some time but it wasn't bad. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good addition for a small office
customer_reviews.text: I have this for about 4 months now. It can take plenty of weight and also is easy to assemble. The design matches well other similar furniture like the homestar series both in wood pattern and overall design.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pyrgiotakis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shelf worth much more than you pay for it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality item that's an amazing deal at the price point it's being sold for. Great that it does not need to be mounted to the wall and has an attractive farmhouse/industrial look. Incredibly sturdy and not at all cheaply made. As a bonus it's very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this shelf, I was under the impression that it would be sturdy and not too complicated to setup. I was wrong. I had a screw that did not fit in all the way and the overall construction of it was not up to par. This is by far the worst furniture piece I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: TChiCity

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and beautiful! Easy assemble, takes about 20 minutes or so. Definitely worth buying it!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Curland

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for my daughter’s room and sturdier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shelf. It was generally easy to assemble. The directions weren’t very clear but easy enough to figure out. Works perfectly in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap but ok for a little while
customer_reviews.text: Can’t put to much on it as wood is very thin and will break
customer_reviews.author: jordan kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Adds a lot to my living room. Easy to assemble and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Elkins

customer_reviews.title: It took me 2 hours to build it.. ...
customer_reviews.text: It took me 2 hours to build it.. The screws provided for the siding did not fit so I had to use my husbands drill and practically strip the screws to have them fit. By the time I was done and actually built the product it is still wobbly due to one of my (stripped screws) not being able to fit all the way! I have it up and decorated for now... I guess for the price I can see how much my hard earned 2 hours was worth
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Martin

customer_reviews.title: had to call the company for them and even then they were the worst instructions ever
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this. Overpriced for the quality of the piece. Metal pieces are poorly welded, bolts and screws seem to barely fit. Came with no instructions, had to call the company for them and even then they were the worst instructions ever. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Colbylyn

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are vague but all in all it’s a beautiful shelf
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really been wanting a ladder shelf and I’ve been searching for one for a while and when this went on sale I jumped at it. The instructions to put this together are very vague. It’s only pictures, so we ran into some confusion when putting this together and once we got everything figured out, it looks BEAUITFUL! I absolutely love it. And I would honestly buy another one if I had the room for it! It’s very sturdy too. It doesn’t see like it’s going to break or bend easily. I highly recommend this piece!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this ladder shelf. Looks beautiful! Putting it together was a bit annoying but easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Seth M

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I use this shelf to hold our printer and office supplies. Very sturdy. I assembled it by myself in about 30 minutes. Thinking about purchasing another one!
customer_reviews.author: Anna A. Walchli

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle and headache
customer_reviews.text: Pain to put together, and not sturdy. We had to use a drill to make sure nothing shook. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: heather stachel

customer_reviews.title: Looks Even Better in Person!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this for a while and moved when I spotted a great price. Purchased two for my home office and they look stunning! The color is true to the picture and give the room the extra something it needed. These shelving units are very sturdy. Couldn't be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: Vickster

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Although I was very excited to receive the product, I ordered this twice, and twice is came missing necessary parts. The bottom part requires two pieces that are slanted for the front and two parts that are straight and supportive for the back. Both times the ladder came without the two back supporting pieces. I am totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to our Home
customer_reviews.text: Love this book shelf! Only took an hour to assemble. It is a little wobbly on carpet but holds all books we could ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these for our apartment and love them! I was able to put one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our apartment and love them! I was able to put one of them together by myself in an hour. Very easy and sturdy. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any space.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous looking shelf, very polished and elegant. Can't speak to assembly since I had my 15 year old nephew put it together, he loves home improvement projects lol. If a 15 year old can put it together, I can't imagine it being that difficult. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great! Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great! Very Sturdy!! Looks much more expensive than price reflects. Set up was pretty easy, although just remember to use BOTH wrenches to screw in bolts. One to hold the screws in place, the other to turn to tighten. You'll get what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: KateCAG9872

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is exactly what I wanted! The size is perfect, and it is beautiful! Yes, it is a pain to put together since the instructions are only a 1 page of pictures, but the cost and the look outweigh this. I'm ordering another one for my entry way! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great in our Bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Really surprised and would highly recommend. No drill or power tool needed to assembly was right up my alley.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted the reviews but this is hands down the worst shelf to put together ... because you can't put it together. The hardware doesn't work and customer service isn't helpful either! ClosetMaid needs to stop making this product OR get it together & get products people can actually use/put together! But seriously, don't even bother buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Katie4

customer_reviews.title: amazing, it looks even better than in the picture
customer_reviews.text: amazing, it looks even better than in the picture. CAREFULL, read the instructions if you do not want to dismatle and set it up again
customer_reviews.author: Carles

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install as long as you have patience. Durable and fit right into my modern farmhouse look
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase, it’s a really classy bookshelf for anywhere in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hibert

customer_reviews.title: Great value for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Really love it. Product was easy to build and a great price. I ordered the cheapest one with a factory default and some pieces were missing but they sent me replacements in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Rockers

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something industrial and modern thanks god I found this one. Looks great. I will buy this again 💕 💯 %
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Marie Belmiz

customer_reviews.title: It's goodOne
customer_reviews.text: One bolt hole was off but still nice for the money
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice piece. I saw this at my sister’s house ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece. I saw this at my sister’s house and loved it. Ordered it next day and it is a centerpiece in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Turian

customer_reviews.title: Crooked
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled we looked at it and it was unmistakably crooked. It was also missing a hole in a spot where you were supposed to put a screw. Returned it because it was so crooked. I don’t know if we just got a bad one but it wasn’t worth the effort to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble even though instructions were just a few pictures. Looks great in the room. Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: cmk05

customer_reviews.title: i love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: i love this shelf. a little hard to put together, but i love the new addition to my living room
customer_reviews.author: S. Ren

customer_reviews.title: sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: put one of these together really wrong and its still standing strong hahahaha! definitely get them! Theyre beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kowal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Looks great in my livingroom. Shelves were deeper than expected and hold a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Bookshelf Rules
customer_reviews.text: I got this shelf after my plywood Ikea bookshelf came toppling over. This bookshelf rules and please take it from me as I have many heavy/large books and this shelf does the trick! Super easy to assemble. RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unclear Directions.
customer_reviews.text: The directions on this product are not at all helpful. They are completely in pictures and no words. The pieces are all labeled but all of the pieces are in the same bag. If the instructions had not assumed that we couldn’t read, we would have had an easier time putting this product together. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quickly, easy to assemble, sturdy, and attractive. What more could you ask for!
customer_reviews.text: We used it in the bathroom. Provides plenty of storage without being bulky. Looks real nice with a couple small plants.
customer_reviews.author: John Goble

customer_reviews.title: Modern bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy modern bookshelf that holds the necessities in my office. Perfectly matches the desk.
customer_reviews.author: P.  Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!!
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute and fits quite a lot on it! The only thing is that it's kind of small/short - wish it was bigger! But overall it's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: simple and well made.
customer_reviews.text: well made and durable. bought for a dorm room shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Dadeo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shelves
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shelves. They’re not real wood, but it doesn’t feel like it’s going to fall apart. They were really easy to put together too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and pretty sturdy for the price. Instructions are useless as others have pointed out. Still worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Real Deal

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Great aesthetic to add to any room. Easier when two people can assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and looks just like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and looks just like the pictures provided. Couldn't be happier with the outcome and look it brings to my room, can store a lot (bad picture I show with everything cluttered on it)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything came fine except one part
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was good for the most part, but one piece came damaged in the corner where one of the holes is. Requested a replacement part, so we’ll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookshelf! Instructions are terrible so be prepared to take apart and put back together multiple times, but can’t complain for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ria69

customer_reviews.title: Box was open and looked damage
customer_reviews.text: Missing screws. When I got home I found the package and one whole side of it was open like the tape was falling coming off of the box . It was half open !
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Flores

customer_reviews.title: Need better directions but so cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute addition to my living room! The directions absolutely suck and it took a while to see and understand what to do. Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kamei Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Need two people to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice and sturdy. Assembled quickly, but I did need an extra set of hands.
customer_reviews.author: fabsgam

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again !!
customer_reviews.text: wood is a bit darker than pictured but it’s super cute and can’t wait to decorate more with plants !!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny H. Rehmert

customer_reviews.title: Best office addition
customer_reviews.text: Great value and just what I needed for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea82

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: chris lesley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as gray as what I thought but I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chki

customer_reviews.title: High quality, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the price... was much bigger and sturdier than I imagined it to be. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, sturdy, and beautiful bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Though it was slightly a pain to assemble (many of the parts seem identical so its easy to get confused), it is a very nice bookcase. I use it mainly for my books but also store plants, blankets, and miscellaneous objects. Lovely aesthetics as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Pender

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my living and dinning room area... I had to go back and get another!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble, but happy with end result!
customer_reviews.text: Like many have said, the assembly instructions are not clear. I’m really happy with How it turned out, though! It’s sturdy and stylish. The grey looks great and the texture isn’t “glossy” like some feaux wood.

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and great shelf to add a bit of ...

product_meta.title: ClosetMaid 1316 4-Tier Wood Ladder Shelf Bookcase, Gray
product_meta.description: Add this ladder shelf from ClosetMaid to your home or office for sleek, stylish organization! designed with retro yet modern, simple appeal, this ladder shelf would fit in any room of your home, like the living area or office. This 4-Tier, A-line style shelf looks great with magazines, photo frames, decor and so much more. For indoor use only. Blending retro and modern design elements, this attractive ladder shelf makes a nice impression in any space. Storing and organizing your books is not a hassle any more. Available in two neutral finishes that gives it a stunning appearance, complementing any home décor. Four spacious shelves that can accommodate books, frames, or collectibles. It has a sleek, slender design that adds creativity to the contemporary or modern style home décor.
feature_bullets: Create decorative storage and display space for any Area of the home with this 4-tier, a-frame style shelf
Ideal for books, photo frames, magazines and more
Distance between top shelves measures 15.43"; Distance between lower shelf measures 14.49"
Materials: Laminate wood and powder-coated steel base; All hardware included
